name: Abigail Priddle
background: Abigail Priddle serves as Commissioning Editor, Specialist Factual at BBC. Focus areas: Arts, religion, specialist factual. They are looking for: Arts celebrating British cultural excellence; religion/ethics exploring faith in modern world. Overall network strategy: The BBC seeks distinctive, authored documentary and specialist factual content that offers depth, intelligence and fresh perspectives while reflecting the diversity of UK audiences.
thematic_priorities: Religion/ethics exploring faith in modern world
Natural history programming with innovative visual approaches and storytelling techniques
Science programming that makes complex topics accessible without oversimplification
History documentaries that connect past events to contemporary issues
Contemporary social issues explored through personal stories
Character-driven documentary series featuring extraordinary individuals or professions
Access-led series with institutions or communities rarely seen on television
Single documentaries (60–90 minutes) with strong authorial voices
Landmark series (3–6 episodes) that can define BBC Two's factual offering
target_audience: Broad UK audiences across BBC channels and iPlayer
format_specifications: Preferred Lengths: Singles 60–90'; series 3–6×60' (features 90' where noted)
Series vs. One-off: Both, depending on story and slot
Scheduling: Primetime where applicable; platform premieres for streamers
Platforms: Linear broadcast and/or streaming platform
Co-production: Open to international co-productions where aligned
Typical Episode Counts: 3–10 for series, depending on strand
budget_parameters: Documentary: £150K–£350K per hour (higher for landmark series with international appeal); Specialist Factual: £180K–£350K per hour
technical_requirements: Broadcast/streaming standards; details provided upon commissioning
Subtitles/captions; audio description per broadcaster requirements
current_calls: Reflect latest broadcaster priorities as outlined above; commissioner-specific interests included.
submission_process: One-page outline with premise, format, and episode breakdown
Details of secured or potential access
Key talent and production team credentials
additional_info: Increasing focus on distinctive voices and cross-platform reach; Emphasis on diverse voices on- and off-screen; Encouragement of sustainable production practices; Support for projects across the UK (where applicable); Open to pitches from independent producers/companies
